name: Magical Otoge Ciel (itch)
description:
Story

Ciel, the protagonist, is a princess who has never been allowed to leave her kingdom. Along with her loyal knight and bodyguard and (unknowingly to her) a certain third/fourth wheeler, she decides to follow her dreams of seeing the world.

It's a very pure story so expect fluff, but know there is mild blood for a short time in the game! Also, beware of the many puns in the game. I'm warning you now so you don't want to... /pun/ch me in the face later.

You can unlock Yvin's route after finishing either Florien or Anton's!

This game is extremely straightforward, so there's no walkthrough necessary.

Characters

Florien: Ciel's childhood friend and knight who is set on protecting her, but also supports Ciel's independence just wants her to be happy. He's kind to Ciel, but is sarcastic and cold to almost everything else. He hates puns.

Anton: Florien's older brother and captain of Amarine's royal knights. He's always calm, cool, and professional, but cares deeply about Ciel and is more of a sincere person than he seems.

Yvin: A clever and witty traveler (not a thief) who ends up following Ciel and her adventures from a distance. It may not seem like it on first impression, but he likes helping out people.

Latest Update: 8/25/16

Note that I've replaced the music with original commissioned songs. Loading at a point where removed songs were playing may cause an error message to pop up if you played an earlier version of the game.

If there are any error messages besides that, please let me know at batensan@gmail.com with a screenshot and I'll get right to fixing it!

This game is free, but I always accept contributions in the form of donations and compliments (especially compliments) ☆ Enjoy the game!
